name: Rule Your School
description: Rule Your School is a game in which you create and manage a school. Choose the correct decisions at the right time and become the best school in town! You are the headmaster, you decide what happens. Organize proms, hire teachers, force students to work in the gardens or be a generous Headmaster and let them play football.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1000 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space
